name: forex_pair_30q_yes_no
title: 30 Yes/No Forex Pair Comparison (News/Text Analysis)
description: Direct BASE vs QUOTE comparison. YES = BASE stronger, NO = QUOTE stronger. Total YES mapped to BUY/NEUTRAL/SELL for BASE.

variables.name: base_texts
variables.description: Recent articles/notes relevant to BASE currency/region

variables.name: quote_texts
variables.description: Recent articles/notes relevant to QUOTE currency/region

prompt.system: You are a precise FX analyst. Answer strictly with JSON.
prompt.instructions: Compare BASE vs QUOTE using the provided texts for each side. For every question, answer YES if evidence indicates BASE is stronger than QUOTE on that dimension; otherwise answer NO. Be decisive and avoid hedging. Use only the provided timeframe and texts.
notes: Review base_texts against quote_texts for each question.
YES always means BASE stronger; NO means QUOTE stronger.
Provide a brief one-sentence explanation for your choice.

response_template.rationale: Optional short summary of key drivers.
